summary: The diff successfully implements all four requirements (REQ-94, REQ-95, REQ-96, REQ-97) for visual revision tracking toggles in the MasterPCMChapterSystem component. The implementation includes toggle buttons with green checkmark/red cross icons, backend integration via the updateChapterRevision mutation hook, real-time percentage calculation, and mobile-responsive layout. All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the evidence in the modified files.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend migration module added (backend/migration.mo) with type definitions and migration function
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states as a constraint: 'Do not modify the backend Chapter type structure; theoryCompleted, pyqsCompleted, and advancedPracticeCompleted fields already exist' and as a non-goal: 'Adding new backend endpoints for revision tracking (already implemented)'. The migration module was not requested and suggests structural changes to backend types.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend main.mo includes migration import and system message about with migration = Migration.run
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest constraint states 'Do not alter the existing backend updateChapterRevision endpoint; use it as-is'. The addition of migration logic was not part of the requirements and suggests backend modifications beyond what was requested.
